label: Timeshare
description: Ownership or rental of vacation properties for a specific period of time.

subcategories.label: Timeshare Resales
subcategories.description: Buying or selling a timeshare from an existing owner.

subcategories.label: Timeshare Rentals
subcategories.description: Renting a timeshare from an owner or resort.

subcategories.label: Timeshare Exit
subcategories.description: Getting out of a timeshare contract or ownership.

subcategories.label: Timeshare Exchange
subcategories.description: Exchanging a timeshare for another location or time period.

subcategories.label: Timeshare Advice
subcategories.description: General advice and information about timeshares.
